title: #19: The People vs. OJ Simpson - All About the Civil Trial
description:
(We realize there are sound issues with this episode. We are fixing them.) Laura Richards is back! She joins Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti for a discussion about The People vs. OJ Simpson and how the Civil Trial differed from the criminal trail.
